title: Anxiety Young People
content:
# Anxiety – young people
## How to manage your anxiety 
### Key points about anxiety in young people
  * Anxiety is really common.
  * There are a lot of life challenges you experience through your teenage and early adult years.
  * Here you can find information, resources and services to help you to manage your anxiety.


![Teenage wahine Māori woman sits on swing](https://healthify.nz/assets/Maori-and-Pasifika-people-/teenage-Maori-wahine-on-swing-Canva.jpg)
####  What is anxiety? 
Anxiety is a feeling of worry, or dread that can make you feel tense, shaky or sick. It might be because of something that’s happening, or going to happen and you fear you won’t cope.
